channel.title: CVE Feed for B&R -- Automation Runtime
channel.description: The latest CVEs for B&R -- Automation Runtime

item.title: CVE-2019-19108|2024-08-05T02:09:39.340Z -- b%26r -- automation%20runtime
item.description: An authentication weakness in the SNMP service in B&R Automation Runtime versions 2.96, 3.00, 3.01, 3.06 to 3.10, 4.00 to 4.63, 4.72 and above allows unauthenticated users to modify the configuration of B&R products via SNMP.
